name: Yogcast Jam Entry
description:
Your friends need your help!  Complete mini games to earn money that you can give to them.

I ran out of time so there is only two mini games and  an incomplete city to explore.
Use WASD to move. 

Arrow keys to rotate camera. 

F to interact with people and arcade machines.

Asset List:

basic animations - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/animations/basic-motions-free-pack-1542...
city - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/polygon-city-pack-95...
town - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/polygon-town-pack-12...
gui - https://craftpix.net/product/wooden-gui/
standard assets - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/asset-packs/standard-assets-for...
mocap - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/animations/raw-mocap-data-for-mecanim-5...
keys - https://hyohnoo.itch.io/keyboard-controller-keys
machines - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/arcade-machines-pack-01-lowpoly-p...
fruit icons - https://gamedeveloperstudio.itch.io/fruits-icon-pack
